text: Isaac Richardson Poole (29 July 1872 - 3 June 1939) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Dick Poole's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1872 births Category:1939 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Dick Poole (footballer)
